Text:
Sometime after the commotion in the Lawless City had
settled down, Cid is troubled about something.
Hmmm...this is not what I was expecting at all...

(There goes my plan to make bank in the Lawless
City... Guess I better think of another plan to cash
in...)
But, it won't be so easy to come up with...
...Hm? Who's that?

Your perception is keen as always. I even masked my
presence.
You... Huh? You look...

I guess it's been a while since you've seen me.
I have especially important business to tend to
today.

Going out at this hour all dressed up...
I get it. You must have a date.

By "date," I presume you mean a rendezvous. No, it's
nothing that cordial. Rather, something was stolen
from me.

(Is this the part where she says something like, "It
was your heart"?)

Regrettably, I must have let my guard down.
But, I never thought it would come to this...

Well, that's too bad. I don't know what this is all
about, but I hope things work out.

That's reassuring coming from you. I must get my
gold coins back to repay you for your kind words.
Uh-huh, best of luck—
...Huh, did you say gold coins?

Didn't I tell you earlier? The gold coins in the
Crimson Tower are gone.

I put a lot of thought into it, but...I think the
logical conclusion is that they were stolen by
someone.

I'm sure I gave them ample time to admire my gold
coins. Pearls before swine, I suppose. It's time I
get them back.
Heh-heh...

(Ironically...the culprit stands right in front of
you!)

Something the matter? That look in your eye...
Could you possibly—
(...Uh-oh. Is she on to me?)
Could you possibly know where the thief is?
Well...um...yeah.

...They were petty looters. I already took care of
them.
Oh, you found them for me? Then I must thank you.
No, it's okay. I've got to get going now—
Then, where are my stolen gold coins?

Are they hidden away in their stronghold or some
other secure location?
Well...
(...Dang it. I screwed up. In times like these...)
Or perhaps someone else absconded with them—
...Here's the last thing they said:

"I hid the gold away somewhere. If you want it,
you have to find it."
So, I don't know where your gold coins are.
I see...

It's a bummer, but we'll just have to give up this
time—
What an amusing turn of events.
Hm?

If word gets out, people all over the world will
embark on a hunt for gold.

Words possess mysterious power. In this case, they
have the power to fill us with desire and stir up
our emotions.

I, too, while searching for my Haven, shall also
seek out my missing gold coins.
(...She bought it? She's surprisingly optimistic.)

(I guess these kinds of adventurous notions are
timeless.)

I thank you from the bottom of my heart for sharing
this valuable information with me.
When I find my gold, I'll share half of it with you.

(O-Oh... Well, she doesn't suspect me anymore, but
I never expected her to take my little lie this far...)
I don't feel right about that...

How upstanding. You don't feel right about
accepting a reward without doing anything,
I presume?

Then why not join me on my quest for the gold coins?
That should soothe your conscience, yes?
Uh...sure, if I have the time.

Hoho, I thought as much. It's a promise then...our
solemn vow. Please don't forget it.
Well, until we meet again...my dear gentleman.

...So, how am I going to keep this charade up the next
time I see her?

Cid mumbles to himself while looking into the night
sky after Elisabeth leaves.
